Title: JC Change Calculator Control
Description: JC Change Calculator is a .NET control that makes it easy for developers to add POS style change calculation to any point of sale type application. It's developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
JC Change Calculator is a .NET control that makes it easy for developers to add POS style change calculation to any point of sale type application. It's developed in C#.



About Project

Currently under development. Visit the downloads page to sample the first beta version of this control.

Important Note

Please leave a quick comment about this control. I have many ideas for the control but they are not much good without your feedback. Your feedback helps determine the fate of this project.
